tests.name: Rate Limit Detection
findings: ‚ö†Ô∏è NO RATE LIMITING DETECTED - All 100 requests succeeded

criticalFindings.impact: API can be overwhelmed with requests, enabling DoS attacks and resource exhaustion
criticalFindings.recommendation: Implement rate limiting immediately (e.g., 100 requests per minute per IP)
criticalFindings.evidence: Successfully sent 100 requests in 629ms without any throttling
